name: THE_UNTITLED_CUBE_GAME
description:
Push the Buttons Move the Sliders Rotate the Knobs Develop your own strategy to get exactly 100 points.  How many cubes will you be able to solve?

Note: the game might not run smoothly if you have the hardware acceleration disabled. If you can't enable it or you prefer playing a desktop version, you can contact me and I'll share a Windows or Linux build with you :)

My entry for the #IndieSpainJam 2022. The development of this game has been streamed on Twitch. 

= Attributions and Assets Used =

#MadeWithUnity & Blender

  • Font: Code New Roman
  • Sfx and Music from Freesound
    • Air Plane Interior Ambience Loop by IanStarGem
    • Motor Vehiculo Futurista Grande.wav by Pepe827
    • Atmospheric industrial loop by BloodPixelHero
  • Dotween by Demigiant
  • Knobs Sliders and Buttons and by float_oat
  • True Shadow by LeTai
